670:1: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
670:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! paramaguhyatamaṃ tvadīyaṃ mūlamudrāsameta saparivāraṃ mudrālakṣaṇaṃ sarvakarmeṣu copa yojyaṃ sarvasampattidāyakaṃ saphalaṃ sarvamantrānuvarttanaṃ sarvakarmārtthasādhakam |
670:6: sā eṣā mañjuśrīstyadīyā mūlamudrā vikhyātā sarvakarmikā bhavati |
670:13: tasya pārśvayorvalitatarjanīyugalamante nyase eṣā mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyamudreyaṃ daṃṣṭrā bhavati |
670:15: eṣā mudrā sākṣāt tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! tasmiṃ sthāne tasmiṃ karapuṭe sānnidhyaṃ samayenādhitiṣṭhase |
670:18: eṣā sā mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyā aparā cīrakamudrā |
670:21: iyamaparā mañjuśrīḥ ! sākṣādeva tvaṃ mūlamūdrā udāhṛtā |
670:24: kanyasānāmikāveṇīkṛtakarapuṭamadhyasthitā madhyamau bahiḥ taḥ tarjanyupari kuñcitāgre aṅguṣṭhāgrasaṃśliṣṭāgrāsu |
670:25: ayamaparā tvadīyā tvadīyā mañjuśrīḥ ! vaktramudrā bhavati sarvakarmikā ||
670:26: evamanena krameṇaikaikāṅgulimatha muṃca ubhau aṅguṣṭhasahitā sarve aṅguliyogena ekaikaṃ prasāraye uccīkṛtadakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhaṃ tvadīyaṃ mañjuśrī ! eṣā uṣṇīṣamudrā|
670:27: dakṣiṇaṃ saṅkocya vāmamucchritaṃ lalāṭamudrā bhavati tvadīyā mañjuśrīḥ ! |
670:29: evaṃ śravaṇo grīvā bhujau hṛdayaṃ karau kaṇṭha kaṭiṃ nābhiḥ ūrū jaṅghāṃ caraṇau netrau vaktraṃ jihvā ceti,
670:36: anyaṃ vā sattvaṃ devāsuraṃ mānuṣāmānuṣādyāṃ vividhāṃ vā gatiniśritāṃ rupitānāṃ krodhanāśanaṃ bhavati ||
670:39: asaṅkhyeyāni ca karmāṇi karoṣi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! sarvathā sarvamudreṣveva sarvakarmāṇi bhavanti ||
670:40: baddhā tā yaiḥ mahāvīraiḥ saṅkhyātītaiḥ tathāgataiḥ |
670:44: sarvamudrāntargatāḥ sarve ye cānyā laukikā kriyā |
670:48: niṣaṇṇaḥ sthitako vāpi yāvādicchaṃ japed vratī |
670:50: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvamudreṣu sarvadā || iti ||
670:55: (etadgranthānte'ntimasya paṭalavisarasya tripañcāśattamasya samāptyanantaraṃ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaro nāma kaścidaparaścatustriṃśattamaḥ paṭalavisaro likhita upalabhyate |
670:56: sa gatasya catustriṃśattamasyaiva prakārabhedo bhavitumarhatītyataḥ kāraṇādihaiva yojyate |)
670:57: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
670:59: śṛṇvantu bhūtagaṇāḥ ! sarve ! devaputrāśca maharddhikāḥ ! asti mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalpavisare samudrāpaṭalasādhanopayikaṃ sarvamantratantracaryānupraviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisambhārakāraṇaṃ |
670:60: yathā sidhyanti sarvamantrāḥ kṣiprataramākṛṣyante sarvakarmāṇi sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ mudrāṇi bhavanti |
670:65: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ mudrālaṅkāratathāgataguṇamāhātmyasamudramudrā nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma |
670:66: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvamudrāsamayaṃ bhāṣate sma |
670:67: tasmāt samādherutthāya sarvatathāgatamudrāmudritaṃ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaraṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ bhāṣate sma ||
670:75: eṣa sa mārṣāḥ ! sarvatathāgatānāṃ hṛdayaḥ sarvakarmikaḥ |
670:79: avalokitasya hṛdayaḥ sarvakarmikaḥ padmakule sarvamudrābandhayatā ayaṃ japtavyaḥ sarvasādhanopayika sarvakarmasu |
670:91: eṣa sa mārṣā ekākṣaraṃ nāma hṛdayam |
670:92: sarvalaukikalokottarāṇāṃ sarvabhūtakūṣmāṇḍapūtanakravyādādiṣu nakṣatragrahamātarakumārakumārikāṇāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyasarvasaṅkhyātavidyādharaṛṣiprabhṛtīnāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvagatisūtrakarmāvabaddhānāṃ sarvabhūtānāmuktānāṃ ca vītarāgānāṃ maharddhikāmaharddhikāṇāṃ tṛdoṣaśamanānāṃ tripaṅkanimagnānāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya ayamekākṣaro mantraḥ sarveṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ bhavati |
670:95: japaṃ kurvāṇa anenaiva hṛdayena japaḥ kartavyaḥ |
670:106: ṣaṣṭhaṃ gadamudrā tu yakṣāṇā me prakīrtitā |
670:114: caturdaśaṃ tu bhavecchaṅkho bherī pañcādaśā smṛtā |
670:115: paṭaho ṣoḍaśā jñeyo dundubhiḥ saptadaśo paraḥ ||
670:117: viṃśat paraśu nirdiṣṭā saṅkhyāyā tu pramāṇataḥ ||
670:119: cīvaraṃ pātranirdiṣṭaṃ khakharaṃ tu mataḥ param ||
670:120: kṛpā maitrī tathā prajñā dhyānaśīla tathāpi ca |
670:127: bhṛkuṭī ca tathā devī buddhānāṃ hṛdayodbhavā ||
670:128: tārāyā kathyate mudrā utpalaṃ tu niyojayet |
670:129: hayagrīvasya tu bhīmasya mudrā vaktra iti smṛtā ||
670:130: vajrapāṇe tathā mudrā triṃśa eka bhavanti te |
670:143: teṣāṃ ca guṇavistāraṃ prabhāvaṃ ca ihocyate ||
670:144: yathā manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavet siddhiḥ saṃyuktā mantrayojitā |
670:150: bandhayet prāṅmukho bhūtvā sthito stūpasya cagrato |
670:164: anyathā na siddhi mantrāṇāṃ sarvamudreṣu vā sadāditi |
670:165: ādau tāvat śucirbhūtvā prāṅmukho śuklacandanena hastamudvartya,
670:168: ubhau karau kṛtāñjalipuṭau aśuṣirau īṣinkuñcitau kuḍmalākārau akośapadmānanau |
670:170: tadeva hastau prasāritau sampuṭāvasthau padmavikasitākārā avalokitasya mudrā |
670:171: ubhau hastau pūrvavat karamāveṣṭayitvā abhyantarasthitābhiraṅgulībhiḥ kanyasaḥ tarjanyopariṣṭhā niṣpīḍayet |
670:173: tadeva kanyasau saṅkocya pūrvavat tarjanyābhiḥ aṅguṣṭhasametau sthitikā eva utpalakuḍmalākāra darśayet |
670:179: punarapi taṃ saṅkocyobhau madhyamāṅgulibhiḥ sandaṃśākāraṃ kṛtvā mastakopari sthāpayet |
670:180: iyaṃ bhagavato cakravartinaḥ ekākṣarasya mahāmudrā sarvakarmikā |
670:181: tadeva lalāṭe sthāpayed buddhasya bhagavataḥ hṛdayamudrā |
670:186: evaṃ yāva mantrī ca bhujau jānujaṅghācaraṇādiṣu viṃśatprakārā bhavanti mudrā aṣṭau mahāmudrā bhavanti |
670:188: tadeva karasampuṭaṃ madhyamāṅgulyāveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā kanyasāṅgulisūcīkṛtāṃ ubhau aṅguṣṭhāgrayavākārasthitau tarjanyā prasāritau kṛtasūcyā kośīkṛtāvubhau nirmāmikau vakrīkṛtaparyantau suvinyastau |
670:204: evamanena prakāreṇa aṣṭau mahāmudrā bhavanti sarvārthasādhakāḥ |
670:208: tadeva hastau tathā vinyastau śirasi bhagavato jayoṣṇīṣasya mudrā |
670:209: ubhau karatalau sampuṭīkṛtya mūrdhniṃ sthāpito uṣṇīṣākāro iyaṃ bhagavato abhyudgatoṣṇīṣasya mudrā |
670:211: iyaṃ jvālāmālinoṣṇīṣamahāmudrā sarvakarmikā sarvabhayeṣu ca prayoktavyā sarvakarmasu |
670:214: tadeva hastau āveṣṭyāvasthitau sudṛḍhau sarvatathāgatānāṃ mahākavacamudrā sarvavighneṣu prayoktavyā |
670:215: tadeva hastau ubhayāgrāvasthitau pustakākārau uromadhye nyaset |
670:216: iyaṃ sā sarvabuddhānāṃ janetrī prajñāpāramitā mahāmudrā |
670:226: tadeva hastau saṅkucitākārau anyonyasaṅkucitasaktau sūcyākāreṇa vyavasthitau madhyamāṅguliprasāritau sūcīkṛtacihnau aṅguṣṭhodvandvaparāmṛṣṭau |
670:228: tadeva mudraṃ śirasopari nidhāya iyamaparā tathāgatoṣṇīṣasya tejorāśermahāmudrā |
670:229: tadeva hastau lalāṭe sthāpayet tenaivākāreṇa iyaṃ bhagavato tṛtīyā netramudrā |
670:230: tadeva hastau ubhayacitrīkṛtau anyonyoparisthitau dakṣiṇārthamatha vāmasampuṭākārasthitau anyonyāṅguṣṭhakanyasāveṣṭitau |
670:233: tadeva hastau sampuṭitau pṛṣṭhīkṛtau sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvamāravidhvaṃsanakarī nāma mudrā |
670:242: tadeva hastau abhayākāraṃ ubhau sarvabhogaviṣayaṃ nāma śanirnāma mahāmudrā|
670:247: tadeva hastau ubhau sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā nāsāgre dhāritavyaḥ |
670:253: teṣāmadhipatiḥ ekākṣaro cakravarttī mantrādhipa asaṅkhyeyāśca tathāgatoṣṇīṣarājānaḥ asaṅkhyeyāśca sarvamantreṣu kalpavisarā|
670:254: teṣāṃ saṃkṣepataḥ vakṣyate mudrā cātra bhavatyeka eva sarveṣāṃ hṛdayaḥ ekākṣaraḥ cakravarttī |
670:255: tasyaiva mūlamudrā sā ihaivocyate mantreṣu nirdiṣṭā mahāprabhāvāmitaujasaḥ |
670:258: adhiṣṭhinti ca vidyāsādhakaṃ cakravartismaraṇādeva mantranāthaṃ ekākṣaramadvitīyaṃ daśabuddhakoṭīkuśalamūlārjito bhavati |
670:259: catasro'pi mūlāpattayorāpannasya bhikṣā tanmahāntaṃ narakopapattivedanīyaṃ karmakṣayaṃ gacchati smaraṇādeva |
670:262: kaḥ punarvādo'nye akuśalāḥ sa tasmāt sarvaprayatnenāyaṃ vidyārājādhipo ekākṣaraḥ smartavyo japtavyaḥ bhāvayitavyo manasi kartavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatamevārādhayitavyaḥ |
670:265: eṣa sa mārṣā sarvoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ ayaṃ mūlamantraḥ |
670:266: anenaiva mantrādhipatinā uṣṇīṣacakravartinā tathāgatamūrdhajena sarvakarmāṇi kārayet |
670:267: mudropetena sarvamantreṣu laukikalokottareṣu kalpavisareṣu niyataṃ sidhyati |
670:269: tadeva hastau sampuṭākārau madhyamāṅguliprasāritau sarvatrāṅgulyāgrābhyantarasthitau kuṇḍalābhogākāra īṣidūrdhvāvanataṃ uṣṇīṣākāraṃ śirasyupari dhārayet |
670:277: śāntyarthe ca pāpakṣapaṇārthaṃ nityameva japtavyaḥ śucau deśe parvatanadīsaritpatitaṭeṣu ca nānyasthāneṣu japtavyo yat kāraṇaṃ mahāprabhāvo'yaṃ vidyārājā nānyadeśeṣu japtavyaḥ |
670:278: prabhāvodgatena manasā sarvasattvānāṃ maitryā sphuritvā japtavyaḥ |
670:280: tadeva hastau karasampuṭākārau āveṇikāṅgulibhiḥ kṛtvā madhyamāṅgulīnāṃ parvabhāge tṛtīye īṣidavanāmayet ||
670:283: tadeva hastau sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā īṣadavanāmayedbhagavatoṣṇīṣasya tṛtīyā mahāmudrā |
670:285: ayaṃ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ hṛdayaḥ sarvakarmikaḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ sarvānarthanivārakaḥ |
670:292: anena japyamānena sarva eva mantrā japtā bhavanti |
670:293: yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā karmāṇi karoti |
670:295: tadeva hastau karasampuṭāvasthau śirasi dhārayet trisūcyākāreṇa |
670:296: iyaṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dvitīyā hṛdayamudrā |
670:300: sarvakarmikā sarvānarthanivārikā sarvārthasampādikā mahāprabhāvā sarvamantrakalpeṣu sādhanīyā |
670:302: yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā sidhyatīti |
670:303: punarapi tadeva hastau sampuṭākārāvasthitau abhyantarāṅgulibhiḥ gāḍhamāveṣṭya ubhau tarjanyau prasāritau īṣadākuñcayecchirasyupari nidhāya darśayet |
670:307: ayaṃ sarvoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ mūlamantraḥ sarvakarmikaḥ diśa diśa sarvabandheṣu prayoktavyaḥ |
670:309: sādhanajapakāle homādiṣu ātmarakṣā pararakṣā vā sarvadravyeṣu sarvamantrakalpeṣu ca yānyuktāni laukikalokottareṣu tānyaśeṣatamanenaiva rakṣā kāryā |
670:313: sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ mahācakravartividyādhipatīnāṃ tejorāśisitātapatrajayoṣṇīṣaprabhṛtīnāṃ yānasādhanavisarapaṭalāni mudrāmantrāṇi tānyaśeṣataḥ vistarato prayoktavyā sarvāṇi ca laukikalokottarāṇi mantratantravistarapaṭalavisarāṃ anantāni ca mudrāṇi |
670:315: om jvalitogradeha vibhinda huṃ phaṭa svāhā |
670:316: eṣa bhagavataḥ tejorāśerbuddhasya paramahṛdayaḥ sarvamantreṣu sarvataḥ sarvakarmikaḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti |
670:317: tadeva hastau yamalitākārau madhyamāṅguliprasāritau tarjanyā pariveṣṭitau kaṭakākāreṇa pāśapariveṣṭitau ubhau kṛtamaṇḍalābhogau |
670:321: eṣa bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ khaṅkharakamudrāmantraḥ sarvakarmasu prayoktavyaḥ |
670:322: yathābhiruciteṣu sarvamantrāṇāṃ pravodhanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vaśaṅkaraḥ sarvasattvānāṃ samāśvāsakaraḥ sarvadravyāṇāṃ samuttejakaḥ sādhakaḥ sarvapāpānāṃ samucchoṣakaḥ |
670:323: yathā yathā prayujyate ayamaṣṭākṣaro tathāgatamantraḥ tathā tathā sarvakarmāṇi sādhayatīti |
670:328: om lokapālādhiṣṭhita dhara dhara dhāraya mahānubhāva buddhapātra svāhā |
670:329: eṣa bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ tathāgatapātramudrāmantra anena saṃyuktaḥ sarvakarmasamarthakaro bhavet ||
670:333: ye'pi tāthāgatī mantrā ye cāpi avalokite ||
670:342: mantrā bhāṣitā ye syuḥ sarvakarmakarā sadā |
670:346: vaśai tā mantrarāṭ svāmī prabhuḥ śreṣṭho mahādyutiḥ |
670:357: kuryāt sampadāṃ kṣipraṃ sarvakarmasu yojitā || iti |
670:358: tadeva hastau karasampuṭākārau savicitraveṇikāvabaddhau lalāṭadeśe sthāpayet |
670:361: namaḥ sarvabuddhebhyaḥ om tejojvāla sarvārthasādhaka sidhya sidhya siddhicintāmaṇiratna hu ||
670:381: tadeva hastau ubhau skandhāvasaktau ardhoparisthitau dakṣiṇavāmāvaṣṭabdhau anyonyāsaktau karamūlasuyojitau |
670:384: om rakṣa rakṣa sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhitā me cīvara svāhā |
670:392: gatamānamadarpa na cāsya kāye śastraṃ nipatati |
670:394: na viṣo na hutāśanaḥ kāye nipatati |
670:398: na ḍākinībhūtapiśācaiśca yakṣarākṣasagandharvai vicitrairvā bhūtagaṇaiḥ ojohāribhiḥ raudracittaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ sarvakravyādairvā hiṃsakaiḥ parasattvaviheṭhakaiḥ pāpakarmāntacāribhirvā rājānairna śakyate hiṃsayituṃ upaghātaṃ karttum |
670:399: kaḥ punarvādo vinā rakṣā vā bhettuṃ sarvakarmādiṣu sarvadravyeṣu jīvitā vyavaropayitum |
670:400: na hi tadvidyate sattvo vā sattvanikāyo vā mantro vā mudro va viṣo vā sthāvarajaṅgamo vā śastro vā praharaṇāni vā vividhāni rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā yakṣā vā yakṣī vā yakṣamahallako vā yakṣamahallikā vā yakṣapārṣado vā yakṣapārṣadī vā peyālaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ sarvasattvebhyaḥ |
670:402: ato na tathāgatamudrācīvaramantreṇa kṛtarakṣāvidhānena jāpamātreṇa vā smaritena vā nānyaśakto bhettuṃ tathāgatamantrairvā sarvabuddhabodhisattvaiśca bhettum |
670:404: evaṃ mahāprabhāvo'yaṃ mantraḥ sarvakarmikaḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ sarvaduṣṭavināśakaḥ sarvamaṅgalasaṅgataḥ sarvārthaparipūrakaḥ sarvadurgatiśodhakaḥ sarvakleśaniṣūdano buddhadharmāṃ paripūrakamiti ||
670:405: tadeva hastau pūrvavat madhyamāṅgulimadhonāmitau anāmikāgrāvasthitau aṅguṣṭhaparināmitau tṛtīyaparvamaṅguṣṭhāviśleṣitau kanyasānāmitau cakrākārau ārāgropetau nābhimaṇḍalopetau kṛtvā śiraḥsthāne sthāpayet |
670:408: om chinda chinda hana hana daha daha dīptacakra hū |
670:417: ayaṃ bhagavāṃ dharmacakraḥ paramantrakṛtaduṣṭasattvopadeśitaprāṇopahāriṇāṃ mantrāṃ hiṃsakāṃ raudrāṃ vikṛtisthāṃ chindayati dālayati pācayati śoṣayati utsādayati ca sādhakecchayā utkīlayati mocayati yathāvyavasthāyāmupasthāpayati |
670:418: yathā yathāyaṃ bhagavāṃ prayujyate tathā tathā karmāṇi karoti varjayitvābhicārukaṃ kāmopasaṃhitānāṃ ca |
670:421: sarvasādhaneṣu laukikalokottareṣu mantramudreṣu kalpokteṣu sarvakarmasu śāntikapauṣṭikeṣu mahārakṣā anenaiva prayoktavyamiti ||
670:424: bhavati cātra mantraḥ - om hulu hulu caṇḍāli mātaṅgi svāhā |
670:437: jayaṃ kṣemaṃ śivaṃ śāntiṃ lapsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
670:441: dhārayiṣyati yo nityaṃ svasti tasya bhaviṣyati ||
670:446: bhavanti cātra siddhāni mantrapadāni mantrasaṃjñāni yathoktārthakarāṇi tu | tadyathā -
670:447: bhañjane stambhane dhā dhā dhā dhatsa yā yā yā yate hā hā hā hate parakaraṇi vīryevīrye guṇatejabhūtakari bhadrakari raudrakari kumbhavati viṣakumbhavati sarvabale bhūtabale rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvaviṣebhyaḥ sarvavighnebhya |
670:448: tadyathā - siddhakari siddhārtthe siddhamanorathe siddhakārye phuru nurūpe svaste praśaste siddhi siddhārthe dhairyavati samane tapane śaraṇe bhadre bhavati śānte dānte śive hununu pari paritrāṇaṃ kuru,
670:453: mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru svāhā |
670:458: pūrvatarameva sakṛt pustakavācikāyāṃ vācayedetadeva kuśalapakṣaṃ bhavati |
670:459: upahṛdayaṃ cātra bhavati - namaḥ saptānāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṅghānāṃ sarvavairabhayātītānām
